Name: The Void of Desires
About the game: Welcome to the temple. Come in, don't be afraid The Void of Desires is a 2D-plaformer, which tells the story of the confrontation between Forsor and Llum and a halfgod, who destroyed their planet. Each of them has their own desire and you will share their path with them and go untill the end, to see if they will be able to fulfill it. Fight for the right to be worthy The temple built by Constructors will meet you fully armed: there are dozens of rooms with varying complexity - you won't be bored. The temple of Constructors will test your strength over and over again. It has a lot of tools to determine - whether you're worthy. Evolve to survive Discover new powers as you move towards the heart of the temple. Every floor has new possibilities, as well as new dangers. Embrace your fears The temple knows you fears. Whatever it is you experience when you go inside - any emotion will amplify many times. Learn all the secrets of the temple Within the walls of this temple there are many secrets waiting to be revealed. Some might seem strange, some painfully familiar... Just listen Enjoy beautiful soundtracks written by Mad Twinz .
